name: Marble Mash
description:
NOTICE: This game is heavily based off of a game called Bonk. If you enjoy this game, please support the creators of Bonk (at bonk.io). I give them full credit for this idea.

With that out of the way, welcome to Marble Mash! Marble Mash is a game where there are two players (Controlled by local multiplayer) that battle each other and try to knock each-other off the platform. The controls are simple: Player 1 uses the arrows while player 2 uses WASD. Whoever falls off the platform first loses.

If you don't have someone to play the game with, you can also player with Syna, CV Programming's AI.
